description:
When running nova boot without a --nic option, nova will try to provision an interface for it, even for shared networks where the user does not have permission to do so. 

There is no way to provision an instance without a network in an installation where a shared network is present.
title: Unable to provision instance without network

comments.content:
When running nova boot without a --nic option, nova will try to provision an interface for it, even for shared networks where the user does not have permission to do so. 

There is no way to provision an instance without a network in an installation where a shared network is present.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~peter-sabaini

comments.content: Which version of nova? are there any stack traces? with neutron or without?
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~dims-v

comments.content:
Some much needed details:

Openstack Icehouse on Ubuntu trusty, ie. 1:2014.1.3-0ubuntu2
python-novaclient                   1:2.17.0-0ubuntu1 
Running Neutron, OVS with GRE tunnels

Demo, tenant w/o any isolated networks:

# Shared networking turned off
$ neutron net-show ext_net | grep shared
| shared                    | False                                |

# Booting works fine w/o --nic parameter
$ nova boot --image 9a65076a-14a1-4d9f-a665-1641e789bae1 --flavor m1.small no-net
...

# No network: check
$ nova list
+--------------------------------------+--------+--------+------------+-------------+----------+
| ID                                   | Name   | Status | Task State | Power State | Networks |
+--------------------------------------+--------+--------+------------+-------------+----------+
| 3ffeb4ff-1f14-49dd-8bdd-d943ccb852dd | no-net | ACTIVE | -          | Running     |          |
+--------------------------------------+--------+--------+------------+-------------+----------+

# Turn on sharing on ext_net with admin user
$ neutron net-update ext_net --shared=True

# Can't create instance, since user doesn't have auth to do so
$ nova boot --image 9a65076a-14a1-4d9f-a665-1641e789bae1 --flavor m1.small no-no-net
ERROR: It is not allowed to create an interface on external network 98377b1a-1888-4bf4-bdea-05924fc07ee1 (HTTP 403) (Request-ID: req-bcdcb3df-f258-4e34-848d-733027a41d09)
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~peter-sabaini
